costly.translation[0].definitions[0].def: very expensive, especially wasting a lot of money
costly.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Such a database would be extremely costly to set up.
costly.translation[0].definitions[1].def: something that is costly causes a lot of problems or trouble
costly.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: His delay in making a decision could prove costly in the long run.
